original_text: Now it came to pass, that when all the people which were with Ishmael saw Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces that were with him, then they were glad.
korean_text: 이스마엘과 함께 있던 모든 백성이 가레아의 아들 요하난과 그와 함께 있던 모든 군 지휘관을 보고 기뻐한지라

sentences.original_text: that when all the people which were with Ishmael
saw Johanan the son of Kareah
and all the captains of the forces that were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 모든 군대 장관들을 보았을 때
